Message:
I thought I might start to
like them if I soaked them
in red, but...

...looks like it didn’t work.
I still hate them.

Maybe it’s best to just color
my favorite things in red.
I love the <ct=3000>dolls</ct> in his mansion, too,
If I soak him in a deep <ct=3000>red</ct>...
I’m sure I’ll love him even more!
Don’t you think so, too, Emma?

Now then, Emma,
let’s head back to his place!
